016
017package com.github.siroshun09.mccommand.bukkit;
018
019import com.github.siroshun09.mccommand.bukkit.sender.BukkitSender;
020import com.github.siroshun09.mccommand.common.Command;
021import com.github.siroshun09.mccommand.common.context.SimpleCommandContext;
022import com.github.siroshun09.mccommand.common.context.CommandContext;
023import org.bukkit.command.CommandExecutor;
024import org.bukkit.command.CommandSender;
025import org.bukkit.command.PluginCommand;
026import org.bukkit.command.TabCompleter;
027import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
028import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
029
030import java.util.List;
031
032/**
033 * The class for registering commands to Bukkit.
034 */
035public final class BukkitCommandFactory {
036
037    private BukkitCommandFactory() {
038        throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
039    }
040
041    /**
042     * Registers the command.
043     *
044     * @param target the {@link PluginCommand}
045     * @param command the command to register
046     */
047    public static void register(@NotNull PluginCommand target, @NotNull Command command) {
048        BukkitCommandImpl bukkitCommand = new BukkitCommandImpl(command);
049
050        target.setExecutor(bukkitCommand);
051        target.setTabCompleter(bukkitCommand);
052    }
053
054    private static class BukkitCommandImpl implements CommandExecutor, TabCompleter {
055
056        private final Command command;
057
058        private BukkitCommandImpl(@NotNull Command command) {
059            this.command = command;
060        }
061
062        @Override
063        public boolean onCommand(@NotNull CommandSender sender, org.bukkit.command.@NotNull Command cmd,
064                                 @NotNull String label, @NotNull String[] args) {
065            command.onExecution(
066                    createContext(sender, label, args)
067            );
068
069            return true;
070        }
071
072        @Override
073        public @Nullable List<String> onTabComplete(@NotNull CommandSender sender, org.bukkit.command.@NotNull Command cmd,
074                                                    @NotNull String label, @NotNull String[] args) {
075            return command.onTabCompletion(
076                    createContext(sender, label, args)
077            );
078        }
079
080        private CommandContext createContext(@NotNull CommandSender sender, @NotNull String label, @NotNull String[] args) {
081            return SimpleCommandContext.newBuilder()
082                    .setCommand(command)
083                    .setSender(new BukkitSender(sender))
084                    .setArguments(args)
085                    .setLabel(label)
086                    .build();
087        }
088    }
089}
